#include <iostream>
#include <set>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

set<int> s;
int a[1000];

void go(int i, int j, int sum) {
    if(i > j) {
        if(sum > 0) {
            s.insert(sum);
        }
        return;
    }
    go(i+1, j, sum);
    go(i+1, j, sum+a[i]);
    go(i+1, j, abs(sum-a[i]));
}

int main()
{
    while(1) {
        int c, n;
        cin >> c;
        if(c == 0) break;
        cin >> n;
        s.clear();

        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            cin >> a[i];
        }
     //   cout << "lol\n";
        go(0, n-1, 0);
        cout << c << " " << s.size() << endl;
    }
}
